home.babylon health: Europe first and only health insurer to fully cover GP consultations through your smart phone at a time and place that is convenient to you.
home.Back Up: Back and neck pain or injury can impact on your wellbeing and lifestyle. With the proper advice from clinical specialists you can prevent, dramatically improve or correct most instances of back and neck pain in the early stages.
home.Dental Access Package: Our range of dental benefits at Smiles Clinics are available as a member benefit on all plans. Members can access orthodontic benefits as well as an enhanced range of dental benefits.
home.Health Screening: At Aviva we're very keen on health screening to help you take greater control of your own health. Knowledge is power and most health problems can be prevented with a little advanced knowledge.
home.Laser Eye Surgery: Members can avail of laser eye surgery, eye tests, glasses, sun glasses and contact lenses on their plan at lower prices for eyes.
home.Asthma Care Programme: We have an exclusive discounts, giving our health members both adults and children the choice to overcome their asthma naturally, safely and minus the side effects.
